column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata takes Japanese tapas-style cuisine to an entirely new level.   Besides our standard miso soup
column2: everything we ordered was truly original.  Items of particular note were the Smoked Duck Salad
column3: Miso Lobster and Macaroni and Cheese
column5: and Gyoza Dumplings.  The sashimi was also fresh and artfully presented.
